price: 57. Ceux qui offensent Allah et Son Messager, Allah les maudira en ce bas monde et dans l’autre. Et Il leur a préparé un supplice humiliant.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا مُّهِينٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yu'dhūna al-laha warasūlahu laʿanahumu al-lahu fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wa-aʿadda lahum ʿadhāban muhīnan
